verses.name: 2 Kings 22:4
verses.text: Go up to Hilkiah the high priest, that he may sum the silver which is brought into the house of the Lord, which the keepers of the door have gathered of the people:

verses.name: 2 Kings 22:5
verses.text: And let them deliver it into the hand of the doers of the work, that have the oversight of the house of the Lord: and let them give it to the doers of the work which is in the house of the Lord, to repair the breaches of the house,

verses.name: 2 Kings 22:6
verses.text: Unto carpenters, and builders, and masons, and to buy timber and hewn stone to repair the house.
